message: I propose we divide the money with a 60/40 split in favor of Alice, given the risk of inflation. This ensures a fair distribution considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'm not convinced by the 60/40 split, I'm willing to take a bigger risk to get a larger share. I'll take a 80/20 split in my favor, but I'm willing to negotiate.
Considering the inflation risk, I propose a 54/46 split in favor of Alice. This maintains a reasonable balance while accounting for the decreasing value of money in each round.
I'm not willing to give up more than 30% of the total. I'll stick to my previous offer, but I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share. This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
